M20.name: "Kill Stealer"
M20.text: Whenever "Kill Stealer" attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

M20.flavor:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist
M20.name: Aerial Assault
M20.text: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.

M20.flavor: The chill wind extinguishes flame, and frosts the leaf on the branch.
M20.name: Aether Gust
M20.text: Choose target spell or permanent that's red or green. Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

M20.flavor: "The more secrets you have, the more easily you become my pawn."
M20.name: Agent of Treachery
M20.text:
When Agent of Treachery enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more permanents you don't own, draw three cards.

M20.name: Ajani, Strength of the Pride
M20.text:
+1: You gain life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of planeswalkers you control.
−2: Create a 2/2 white Cat Soldier creature token named Ajani's Pridemate with "Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate."
0: If you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, exile Ajani, Strength of the Pride and each artifact and creature your opponents control.

M20.name: Angel of Vitality
M20.text:
Flying
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Angel of Vitality gets +2/+2 as long as you have 25 or more life.

M20.name: Atemsis, All-Seeing
M20.text:
Flying
{2}{U}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever Atemsis, All-Seeing deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal your hand. If cards with at least six different converted mana costs are revealed this way, that player loses the game.

M20.name: Barkhide Troll
M20.text:
Barkhide Troll enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Barkhide Troll: Barkhide Troll gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

M20.flavor: "Within every angel is a spirit of light that will fight as long as there is darkness."
M20.name: Bishop of Wings
M20.text:
Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 4 life.
Whenever an Angel you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

M20.flavor: Leaf and soul alike wither at its touch.
M20.name: Blightbeetle
M20.text:
Protection from green (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything green.)
Creatures your opponents control can't have +1/+1 counters put on them.

M20.flavor:
"You've heard that a vampire can't enter a home without an invitation? A lie meant to help you sleep at night."
—Kerin, watch sergeant
M20.name: Blood Burglar
M20.text: As long as it's your turn, Blood Burglar has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

M20.name: Bloodfell Caves
M20.text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

M20.flavor: A circus acrobat in life, she kills with such fluid grace that even her victims are awed by her performance.
M20.name: Bloodthirsty Aerialist
M20.text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodthirsty Aerialist.

M20.name: Blossoming Sands
M20.text:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

M20.flavor:
"I will make your bones into a weapon that will lay even the mighty low."
—Modriss of Zargoth Fen
M20.name: Bone Splinters
M20.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

M20.flavor: "Living or dead, everyone responds to the proper motivation."
M20.name: Boneclad Necromancer
M20.text: When Boneclad Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

M20.flavor:
"That's enough of that."
—Atemsis, All-Seeing
M20.name: Captivating Gyre
M20.text: Return up to three target creatures to their owners' hands.

M20.name: Cavalier of Dawn
M20.text:
Vigilance
When Cavalier of Dawn enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
When Cavalier of Dawn dies, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

M20.name: Cavalier of Flame
M20.text:
{1}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
When Cavalier of Flame enters the battlefield, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
When Cavalier of Flame dies, it deals X damage to each opponent and each planeswalker they control, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard.

M20.name: Cavalier of Night
M20.text:
Lifelink
When Cavalier of Night enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
When Cavalier of Night dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

M20.name: Cavalier of Thorns
M20.text:
Reach
When Cavalier of Thorns enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest into your graveyard.
When Cavalier of Thorns dies, you may exile it. If you do, put another target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

M20.flavor: Dragons avoid the bright colors of its wings.
M20.name: Cerulean Drake
M20.text:
Flying
Protection from red (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything red.)
Sacrifice Cerulean Drake: Counter target spell that targets you.

M20.flavor: "Furballs? Try dealing with Fireballs." —Chandra Nalaar
M20.name: Chandra's Embercat
M20.text: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or a Chandra planeswalker spell.

M20.name: Chandra's Regulator
M20.text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of a Chandra planeswalker, you may pay {1}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
{1}, {T}, Discard a Mountain card or a red card: Draw a card.

M20.flavor: "I've lit most everything on fire—trees, rocks, even the water. Now it's time to burn the clouds."
M20.name: Chandra's Spitfire
M20.text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent is dealt noncombat damage, Chandra's Spitfire gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

M20.name: Chandra, Acolyte of Flame
M20.text:
0: Put a loyalty counter on each red planeswalker you control.
0: Create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.
−2: You may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

M20.name: Chandra, Awakened Inferno
M20.text:
This spell can't be countered.
+2: Each opponent gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 1 damage to you."
−3: Chandra, Awakened Inferno deals 3 damage to each non-Elemental creature.
−X: Chandra, Awakened Inferno deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker. If a permanent dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

M20.name: Chandra, Novice Pyromancer
M20.text:
+1: Elementals you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
−1: Add {R}{R}.
−2: Chandra, Novice Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

M20.flavor: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."
M20.name: Cloudkin Seer
M20.text:
Flying
When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.

M20.flavor: "Let's see how badly you want what you came for!"
M20.name: Convolute
M20.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

M20.flavor:
"With each knight that rode out from the bone-white keep, the queen's soldiers felt their courage failing."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*
M20.name: Corpse Knight
M20.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

M20.flavor: The destruction of a wildfire with the tenacity of a jungle vine.
M20.name: Creeping Trailblazer
M20.text:
Other Elementals you control get +1/+0.
{2}{R}{G}: Creeping Trailblazer gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.

M20.flavor: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.
M20.name: Cryptic Caves
M20.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

M20.flavor: "I love digging. It gives me lots of time to think about how much I love digging."
M20.name: Destructive Digger
M20.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or land: Draw a card.

M20.flavor: "It is not punishment. I am simply making things as they should be." —Sephara, Sky's Blade
M20.name: Devout Decree
M20.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker that's black or red. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

M20.name: Diamond Knight
M20.text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
As Diamond Knight enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, put a +1/+1 counter on Diamond Knight.

M20.flavor: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.
M20.name: Disenchant
M20.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

M20.flavor:
"Let this serve as a reminder of your failure."
—Exdratha, bog witch

M20.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

M20.name: Dismal Backwater
M20.text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

M20.flavor: "I see it taunting me whenever I close my eyes." —Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief

M20.text: {1}, {T}: Choose a card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, sacrifice Diviner's Lockbox and draw three cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

M20.flavor:
"Yes, it's huge and strong and breathes fire. But we're smart!"
—Tadith the Wise, last words
M20.name: Dragon Mage
M20.text:
Flying
Whenever Dragon Mage deals combat damage to a player, each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

M20.flavor:
"From a sea of infinite possibilities, our choices create the future."
—Mu Yanling
M20.name: Drawn from Dreams
M20.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

M20.flavor: It beckons silently, waiting in the darkness.
M20.name: Dread Presence
M20.text:
Whenever a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Dread Presence deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

M20.name: Dungeon Geists
M20.text:
Flying
When Dungeon Geists enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Dungeon Geists.

M20.text:
Elvish Reclaimer gets +2/+2 as long as there are three or more land cards in your graveyard.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

M20.flavor: Not every job on the goblin army is glamorous. Actually, *no* job in the goblin army is glamorous.
M20.name: Ember Hauler
M20.text: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: It deals 2 damage to any target.

M20.flavor: All the birds of the skies are the spirit's brood, gathered for safety under its wings.
M20.name: Empyrean Eagle
M20.text:
Flying
Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

M20.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.
M20.name: Evolving Wilds
M20.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

M20.flavor: The strongest pack has the fiercest pups.

M20.text: When Ferocious Pup enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

M20.text:
Field of the Dead enters the battlefield tapped.

Whenever Field of the Dead or another land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

"I have calculated that a dragon in flight, in a single strafing run, can cover an area of—"
—Thaedus the Clever, last words

M20.text: Flame Sweep deals 2 damage to each creature except for creatures you control with flying.

M20.flavor:
"I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean."
—Mu Yanling
M20.name: Flood of Tears
M20.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

M20.flavor: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.
M20.name: Frost Lynx
M20.text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

"I'm afraid your dinner got a little . . . overcooked."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper
M20.name: Fry
M20.text:
This spell can't be countered.

M20.text: {R}: Goblin Bird-Grabber gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with flying.

M20.text:
Haste
When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

M20.flavor: "I am but a humble traveler. I have no taste for sneakery nor thiefiness."
M20.name: Goblin Smuggler
M20.text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
{T}: Another target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

M20.name: Golos, Tireless Pilgrim
M20.text:
When Golos, Tireless Pilgrim enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
{2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile the top three cards of your library. You may play them this turn without paying their mana costs.

M20.flavor: "Shed your faded husk! Emerge sleeker and stronger!" —Tyris, fauna shaman
M20.name: Growth Cycle
M20.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. It gets an additional +2/+2 until end of turn for each card named Growth Cycle in your graveyard.

Flying
When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
{3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

Enchant creature

Flying

M20.text:

{3}, {T}: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card of the chosen type from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

M20.flavor:
"No shirt, no shoes, no service."
—Marketplace sign

M20.text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

Flying, vigilance

M20.text:

At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Knight of the Ebon Legion. (Damage causes loss of life.)

M20.name: Kykar, Wind's Fury
M20.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Sacrifice a Spirit: Add {R}.

M20.name: Lavakin Brawler
M20.text: Whenever Lavakin Brawler attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.

M20.flavor: "I am rooted in the life of all that thrives around me. You cannot move me."
M20.name: Leafkin Druid
M20.text: {T}: Add {G}. If you control four or more creatures, add {G}{G} instead.

M20.flavor:
"With a single word, they were unmade."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*
M20.name: Legion's End
M20.text: Exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 2 or less and all other creatures that player controls with the same name as that creature. Then that player reveals their hand and exiles all cards with that name from their hand and graveyard.

M20.name: Leyline of Abundance
M20.text:
If Leyline of Abundance is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Whenever you tap a creature for mana, add an additional {G}.
{6}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

M20.text:
If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You may cast spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

M20.name: Leyline of Combustion
M20.text:
If Leyline of Combustion is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Whenever you and/or at least one permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, Leyline of Combustion deals 2 damage to that player.

M20.name: Leyline of Sanctity
M20.text:

You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

M20.text:
If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.

"The living don't ever stay living, and the dead don't always stay dead."
—Jeddeg, philosopher of graves

Hexproof

SS2.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

SS2.text:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

SS2.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has indestructible.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may attach Shielded by Faith to that creature.
